long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fireboy and Watergirl is an exciting online game that is also available as a Chrome extension. In this game, players control two characters, Fireboy and Watergirl, and their objective is to navigate through various levels filled with challenging puzzles and obstacles. Fireboy can move through fire and collect red diamonds, while Watergirl can move through water and collect blue diamonds. Players must strategically control both characters simultaneously, utilizing their unique abilities to solve puzzles and reach the exit of each level. The game requires coordination, problem-solving skills, and teamwork to succeed. You can enjoy playing "Fireboy and Watergirl" for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
